EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmed Place on NCS!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCS powered by The Challenge
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
{!Contact.FirstName}'s place on NCS is confirmed!
Dear Parent or Guardian of {!Contact.Name},
Congratulations! {!Contact.FirstName} now has a confirmed place on National Citizen Service (NCS) and a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to develop skills and meet new people.
Their programme will be starting on {!Wave_Selection__c.PC_KO_Day__c} and their meeting points will be in {!Wave_Selection__c.Demand_smoothing_acc_comm_line__c}{!Wave_Selection__c.Programme_Pack_Girls_Only_Wave__c}. We have sent {!Contact.FirstName} an email to let them know that they have a confirmed place too.
The dates {!Contact.FirstName} will be on NCS are:
Part 1 - Get Active Staying away from home: {!Wave_Selection__c.PC_KO_Day__c} until {!Wave_Selection__c.PC_Return_Day__c}
Part 2 - Get Involved Staying away from home: {!Wave_Selection__c.TC_KO_Day__c} until {!Wave_Selection__c.TC_End_Day__c}
Part 3a - Make Your Mark {!Wave_Selection__c.Acc_prog_length_PART3A_copy__c} {!Wave_Selection__c.RCD_Start_Date__c} until {!Wave_Selection__c.RCD_End_Date__c}
Part 3b - Make Your Mark Daily activities, staying at home at night: {!Wave_Selection__c.RCA1_Sat__c}, {!Wave_Selection__c.RCA_2_Sat__c}, {!Wave_Selection__c.RCA3_Sat__c} and {!Wave_Selection__c.RCA_4_Sat__c}
If these dates don't work for {!Contact.FirstName} please click here to see your next steps.
What will happen next?
Approximately one month before the start date, we will send you:
An information pack for {!Contact.FirstName}’s NCS programme. This will give you meeting points, times and other important information, such as a packing list.
An invitation to an information evening happening a week or two before {!Contact.FirstName} starts NCS. Here you and {!Contact.FirstName} will have the chance to meet us and ask any questions.
{!Contact.FirstName} will receive their free NCS T-shirt – exclusively for NCS participants - either when we visit their school or college again or on the first day of NCS.
How you can find out more about NCS:
How long each programme lasts, and what activities will take place on each part of NCS, can vary from programme to programme. To see information about the activities on {!Contact.FirstName}’s particular programme, please go to {!Wave_Selection__c.Acc_comm_prog_variation_URL__c}. You can search questions.ncsthechallenge.org for more information, such as example meals and packing lists. You can read our terms and conditions at www.ncsthechallenge.org/terms. And of course, you can call us on 0203 542 2400 or email us at contact@ncsthechallenge.org – we’re always happy to help!
We are really looking forward to seeing {!Contact.FirstName} on NCS this summer.
Yours sincerely,
Tanya Dunne Head of Customer Service The Challenge (largest provider of NCS)
